text: When I add a `{% dnd_area %}` to a template. Is there a means for content editors to then add sections, row, columns to this area? I’m not seeing this, but I hope there is a way for them to section it off if they wish. ?

So people in the editor can’t _explicitly_ add new empty sections / columns / rows, but those structures will automatically be created by the editor depending on how modules are added / moved around / cloned within the editor.
